HOME_PAGE.TITLE: Online Scheduling App
HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: A multi-tenant solution for managing appointments and calendars.

STEP_1.TEXT: Choose your organization to get started.

STEP_3.TEXT: Schedule, assign, and oversee bookings with ease.

LOGIN_OPTIONS.TITLE: Login Options
LOGIN_OPTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Depending on the selected tenant, your login will determine your access level. As an Owner, Admin, or Regular User, you can perform different actions within the app. However, viewing the calendar does not require logging in, so users can explore available schedules freely after selecting the tenant.

OWNER.TITLE: Owner
OWNER.DESCRIPTION: Full control over tenants and calendars.

CUSTOMIZABLE_TENANTS.TITLE: Customizable Tenants
CUSTOMIZABLE_TENANTS.DESCRIPTION: Generate a QR code for your calendars, making it easy for students or customers to view your availability and request appointments directly.

ROLE_BASED_ACCESS.TITLE: Role-Based Access
ROLE_BASED_ACCESS.DESCRIPTION: Manage users with roles like Owner, Admin, and Regular User for optimal control.

PRIVACY_CONTROLS.TITLE: Flexible Privacy Controls
PRIVACY_CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Define who can view, book, or manage appointments with ease.
